name: Security Attendance Report
query:
SELECT  sa.owner as `Created by`,
        sa.modified_by as `Approved by`,
        upper(sa.shift_name) as `Shift`,
        sa.shift_date as `Date:Date:`,
        sad.guard_name as `Guard Name`,
        sad.position as `Position`, 
        if(sad.status = 'Present', 1, 0) as `Present:Int:`,
        if(sad.status = 'Absent ', 1, 0) as `Absent:Int:`,
        if(sad.status = 'Day off', 1, 0) as `Day off:Int:`,
        1 as `Total:Int:`,
        sad.remarks as `Remarks`
FROM    `tabSecurity Attendance` as  sa,
        `tabSecurity Attendance Details` sad
WHERE   sa.name = sad.parent

name: Outsourcing Attendance
query:
SELECT  oa.owner as `Created by`,
        oa.modified_by as `Approved by`,
        upper(oa.shift_name) as `Shift`,
        oa.shift_date as `Date:Date:`,
        oad.person_name as `Person Name`,
        oad.position as `Position`, 
        if(oad.status = 'Present', 1, 0) as `Present:Int:`,
        if(oad.status = 'Absent ', 1, 0) as `Absent:Int:`,
        if(oad.status = 'Day off', 1, 0) as `Day off:Int:`,
        1 as `Total:Int:`,
        oad.remarks as `Remarks`
FROM    `tabOutsourcing Attendance` as  oa,
        `tabOutsourcing Attendance Details` oad
WHERE   oa.name = oad.parent

name: Security Deposit
query:
SELECT 	jea.cost_center AS "Cost Center:Link/Property:150",
	jea.party AS "Party:Link/Property:150", 
	CONCAT(pr.bedroom, ' BHK') AS "BHK::50",
	account_currency AS "Currency::50",
	FORMAT(SUM(debit_in_account_currency - credit_in_account_currency) * -1,2) "Amount::100"
FROM `tabJournal Entry Account` jea
	LEFT JOIN `tabProperty` pr on jea.cost_center = pr.cost_center
WHERE jea.account LIKE %(account)s 
AND jea.docstatus = '1'
GROUP BY jea.cost_center, party

name: Debtors Report
query:
SELECT  COALESCE(gsi.name, "TOTAL") AS "Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
        if(gsi.name is null, "", gsi.customer) AS "Customer:Link/Customer:250",
        gsi.cost_center AS "Cost Center:Data:250",
        gsi.item AS "Items:Data:300",
		gsi.from_date AS "From Date:Date:100", 
		gsi.to_date AS "To Date:Date:100", 
		gsi.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100", 
        FORMAT(SUM(gsi.usd),2) AS "USD:Decimal/2:100",
        FORMAT(SUM(gsi.tzs),2) AS "TZS:Decimal/2:100",
        gsi._user_tags as "Remarks:Data:200" 
FROM
(
    SELECT 	si.name, 
    		si.customer,
    		si.cost_center,
    		GROUP_CONCAT(sid.item_name) AS "item",
    		si.from_date,
    		si.to_date, 
    		si.due_date, 
    		si.currency,
        	MAX(IF(si.currency = "USD", IF( si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount/si.conversion_rate), 0)) AS "usd",
    	    MAX(IF(si.currency = "TZS", IF( si.currency = si.party_account_currency, si.outstanding_amount, si.outstanding_amount*si.conversion_rate), 0)) AS "tzs",
    		si._user_tags
    FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` as sid ON si.name = sid.parent
    WHERE si.status IN ("Partly Paid", "Unpaid", "Unpaid and Discounted", "Partly Paid and Discounted", "Overdue and Discounted", "Overdue")
    GROUP BY si.name
) gsi
GROUP BY gsi.customer, gsi.name WITH ROLLUP

name: Property Status
query:
SELECT  p.name AS "Property:Link/Property:150",
        p.type AS "Property Type:Data:150",
        p.bedroom AS "BHK:Data:50",
        p.builtup_area AS "Builtup Area:Data:100",
        p.carpet_area AS "Carper Area:Data:100",
        p.unit_owner AS "Unit Owner:Link/Customer:150",
        c.customer_group AS "Owner Type:Data:150",
        l.lease_customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
        l.end_date AS "End Date:Date:100",
        l.lease_status AS "Status:Data:80",
        l.name AS "Lease:Link/Lease:100",
        l.security_deposit_currency AS "Currency:Data:50",
        l.security_deposit AS "Amount:Float:100",
        l.security_status AS "Security Status:Data:100",
        GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS('-',li.lease_item,FORMAT(li.amount,2)) SEPARATOR ' | ') AS "Lease Details:Data:400"
FROM `tabProperty` p left join `tabLease` l on p.name = l.property
                     LEFT JOIN `tabLease Item` li on l.name = li.parent
                  left join `tabCustomer` c on p.unit_owner = c.name
WHERE p.type LIKE concat("%%", IF(%(property_type)s = " " , "", %(property_type)s), "%%")
AND c.customer_group LIKE concat("%%", IF(%(owner_type)s = " " , "", %(owner_type)s), "%%")
GROUP by p.name
ORDER BY p.name

name: Creditors Report
query:
SELECT 	pi.name AS "Invoice No:Link/Purchase Invoice:150", 
		pi.supplier AS "Customer:Link/Supplier:150", 
		GROUP_CONCAT(pid.item_name) AS "Items:Data:200",
		pi.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100", 
		ROUND(IF(pi.currency = "USD", IF( pi.currency = pi.party_account_currency, pi.outstanding_amount, pi.outstanding_amount/pi.conversion_rate), 0),2) AS "USD:Float:100",
		ROUND(IF(pi.currency = "TZS", IF( pi.currency = pi.party_account_currency, pi.outstanding_amount, pi.outstanding_amount*pi.conversion_rate), 0),2) AS "TZS:Float:100",
		pi._user_tags as "Remarks:Data:200"
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` as pid ON pi.name = pid.parent
WHERE pi.status IN ("Sumitted", "Unpaid", "Overdue")
GROUP BY pi.name

name: Self Consumption in Maintenance Job Card
query:
SELECT  jc.name as "Maintenance Job Card:Link/Issue:200",
        jc.property_name  as "Property:Link/Property:200",
        jc.customer  as "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
        jc.opening_date as "Opening Date:Date:120",
        jc.resolution_date as "Resolution Date:Date:120",
        jc.modified_by as "Modified By:Link/User:200",
        jc.status as "Status:Data:120",
        jcmb.item as "Item:Link/Item:200",
        jcmb.quantity as "Quantity:Float:200",
        jcmb.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:200",
        jcmb.rate as "Rate:Currency:120",
        jcmb.amount as "Amount:Currency:200",
        "" as "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:200"
        FROM `tabIssue` jc
        INNER JOIN `tabIssue Materials Detail` jcmb on jcmb.parent = jc.name
        WHERE jc.docstatus = 0
          AND DATE(jc.opening_date) BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
UNION ALL
SELECT  jc.name as "Maintenance Job Card:Link/Issue:200",
        jc.property_name  as "Property:Link/Property:200",
        jc.customer  as "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
        jc.opening_date as "Opening Date:Date:120",
        jc.resolution_date as "Resolution Date:Date:120",
        jc.modified_by as "Modified By:Link/User:200",
        jc.status as "Status:Data:120",
        jcb.item as "Item:Link/Item:200",
        jcb.quantity as "Quantity:Float:200",
        jcb.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:200",
        jcb.rate as "Rate:Currency:120",
        jcb.amount as "Amount:Currency:200",
        jcb.sales_invoice as "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:200"
        FROM `tabIssue` jc
        INNER JOIN `tabIssue Materials Billed` jcb on jcb.parent = jc.name
        WHERE jc.docstatus = 1
          AND DATE(jc.opening_date) BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
ORDER BY "Opening Date", "Maintenance Job Card", "Sales Invoice", "Item"
report_name: Self Consumption in Maintenance Job Card

roles.parent: Self Consumption in Maintenance Job Card
Self Consumption in Maintenance Job Card

name: Lease Information
query:
SELECT  p.type AS "Property Type:Data:0",
        l.property AS "Property:Link/Property:0",
        l.name "Lease No.:Data:0",
        p.bedroom AS "BHK:Data:0",
        p.builtup_area AS "Builtup Area:Data:0",
        p.carpet_area AS "Carper Area:Data:0",
        p.unit_owner AS "Unit Owner:Link/Customer:0",
        l.lease_customer AS "Lease Customer:Link/Customer:0",
        l.customer as "POS Customer:Link/Customer:0",
        l.lease_date as "Lease Date:Date:0",
        l.start_date as "Lease Start:Date:0",
        l.end_date as "Lease End:Date:0",
        if(l.signed_agreement_received = 1, "Yes", " ") AS "Agreement Status:Data:0",
        if(l.stamp_duty_paid_by_tenant = 1, "Yes", " ") AS "Stamp Duty Status:Data:0",
        l.security_deposit_currency as "Security Deposit Currency:Data:0",
        l.security_deposit as "Security Amount:Currency/Security Deposit Currency:0",
        ld1.frequency AS "Rent Frequency:Data:0",
        ld1.currency_code AS "Rent Currency:Data:0",
        ld1.amount as "Rent Amount:Currency/Rent Currency:0",
        ld2.frequency AS "Service Charge Frequency:Data:0",
        ld2.currency_code AS "Service Charge Currency:Data:0",
        ld2.amount as "Service Charge Amount:Currency/Service Charge Currency:0"
FROM `tabLease` l left join `tabProperty` p on l.property = p.name
                  left join `tabLease Item` ld1 on l.name = ld1.parent and (ld1.lease_item in ('Commercial Rent', 'Residential Rent') or ld1.lease_item like 'Parking Slot%%')
                  left join `tabLease Item` ld2 on l.name = ld2.parent and ld2.lease_item in ('Service Charge - Commercial','Service Charge - Residential')
WHERE p.type LIKE concat("%%", IF(%(property_type)s = " " , "", %(property_type)s), "%%")

name: Subscription Service Report
query:
SELECT si.name, 
       si.customer,
	   from_date,
	   to_date
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii on si.name = sii.parent
WHERE si.from_date IS NOT NULL 
AND   si.to_date IS NOT NULL 
AND   sii.item_group = 'Services'
AND   si.item_name = %(service_type)s;

name: Withholding Tax Summary on Sales (Properties)
query:
SELECT si.posting_date as "Date:Date:",
       si.customer_name as "Customer:Link/Customer:", 
       sii.item_name as "Perticulars:Data:", 
       si.name as "Voucher No:Link/Sales Invoice:", 
       si.lease as "Property:Link/Lease:",
       concat_ws(' and ', sii.service_start_date, sii.service_end_date) as "Period:Data:", 
       sii.base_net_amount as "Amount:Currency:", 
       sii.base_net_amount * (sii.withholding_tax_rate/100) as "Withholding Tax:Currency:",
       si.tra_control_number as "Contol Number:Data:",
       si.witholding_tax_certificate_number as "Contol Number:Data:",
       if(si.tax_id,si.tax_id,c.tax_id) as "TIN Number:Data:"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent 
INNER JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON si.customer = c.name
WHERE si.docstatus = 1
AND   si.is_return = '0' 
AND   sii.withholding_tax_rate > 0
AND   si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND   si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s

name: Withholding Tax Summary on Sales for Properties
query:
SELECT si.posting_date as "Date:Date:",
       si.customer_name as "Customer:Link/Customer:", 
       sii.item_name as "Perticulars:Data:", 
       si.name as "Voucher No:Link/Sales Invoice:", 
       si.lease as "Property:Link/Lease:",
       concat_ws(' and ', sii.service_start_date, sii.service_end_date) as "Period:Data:", 
       sii.base_net_amount as "Amount:Currency:", 
       sii.base_net_amount * (sii.withholding_tax_rate/100) as "Withholding Tax:Currency:",
       si.tra_control_number as "Contol Number:Data:",
       si.witholding_tax_certificate_number as "Contol Number:Data:",
       if(si.tax_id,si.tax_id,c.tax_id) as "TIN Number:Data:"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent 
INNER JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON si.customer = c.name
WHERE si.docstatus = 1
AND   si.is_return = '0' 
AND   sii.withholding_tax_rate > 0
AND   si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND   si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
report_name: Withholding Tax Summary on Sales for Properties

roles.parent: Withholding Tax Summary on Sales for Properties
Withholding Tax Summary on Sales for Properties
